summary.en: Article Writer is an AI-powered intelligent writing system designed for WeChat Official Accounts and self-media content. It integrates 13 AI platforms including Claude, Cursor, and Gemini via slash commands. Its core innovation is a multi-mode writing framework (Coach/Quick/Hybrid/Constrained) with an 11-step workflow, addressing the lack of authenticity in AI-generated content through features like document crawling, material libraries, and triple proofreading.

summary.en: Novel Writer is an AI-powered Chinese novel writing tool based on Specification-Driven Development (SDD), enabling systematic novel creation via slash commands in AI assistants like Claude, Cursor, and Gemini. It features a seven-step methodology, plot tracking, character consistency checks, and is optimized for Chinese fiction with cross-platform support and plugin extensibility.

summary.en: OpenScreen is a free, open-source screen recording app offering watermark-free, subscription-free commercial use. It supports custom zooms, background customization, video trimming, and export in multiple formats. Built with Electron, React, and TypeScript, it serves as a lightweight alternative to Screen Studio for product demos and walkthroughs.

summary.en: ClashMac is a native macOS proxy client built with SwiftUI, offering deep system integration. Key features include global route map visualization, real-time connection topology, 4D traffic statistics (by proxy/process/interface/host), and dual proxy modes (system + TUN). It provides menu bar residency, privacy mode, one-click node switching, and automatic disconnection for seamless proxy management.

summary.en: vget is a versatile downloader that supports fetching audio, video, podcasts, PDFs, and more from various sites. It offers CLI and Docker deployment, WebDAV remote management, multi-language configuration, and an interactive setup wizard, ideal for cross-platform automated downloading.
